ComicInfo.Series: Dungeons & Dragons: At the Spine of the World
ComicInfo.Summary:
A never-ending winterâ€™s night is slowly driving an isolated town in the depths of Icewind Dale to the brink of insanity. To save them all, a perilous journey awaits a band of adventurers as they uncover the plot of an ancient primordial evil! Based on the massively popular game and featuring a cast of brand-new characters written by New York Times bestselling author AJ Mendez plus writer and actor Aimee Garcia!
